content.query:
--IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id 
--WHERE O.NAME = 'NYCTaxiTripSmall' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')


CREATE TABLE dbo.#NYCTaxiTripSmall
    (
     [BusinessEntityID] int
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.#NYCTaxiTripSmall
(BusinessEntityID)
FROM 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/test/SalesPerson_CT.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
    --,FILE_FORMAT='csvFileformat'
    ,FIRSTROW = 2
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
   , FIELDTERMINATOR ='|'
   , ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
) 
 

 select * from  dbo.#NYCTaxiTripSmall
